name: Wizard Breakout (Vortex070)
description:
The Crazy 128 Overview

Wizard Breakout is a 3D remake of the classic game Breakout. Use the great wizard’s shield to bounce your energy orb around the space and defeat all enemies.

Character

You play as the wizard and you move the magic shield around the X and Y axis to bounce magic orbs and destroy enemies.

Camera

The camera will be looking at the enemies from behind the shield spell.

Controls

The player will have access to a joystick and one button. The joystick will move the position of the shield and the button will launch the magic orbs at the start of the game.
